Type.description: What type of wisp is contained within the capsule.

ResetTime.description: How long before this object respawns.

Asteroid.description: Whether this capsule contains an Asteroid wisp.

Lightning.description: Whether this capsule contains a Lightning wisp.

Cube.description: Whether this capsule contains a Cube wisp.

Drill.description: Whether this capsule contains a Drill wisp.

Burst.description: Whether this capsule contains a Burst wisp.

Void.description: Whether this capsule contains a Void wisp.

Hover.description: Whether this capsule contains a Hover wisp.

Extra.value: Red capsules containing those cute little aliens that everyone in the fanbase completely adores
